Floor Plans

Plantation Oaks is nestled among magnificent oak and flowering magnolia trees. The lush landscaping provides the perfect setting for outdoor activities or a serene view from your screened in porch. Situated west of the Ashley River, Plantation Oaks is located in close proximity to downtown Charleston, the Ashley River or local beaches. Plantation Oaks offers the apartment home features and community conveniences that will enhance your quality of life. Welcome home to a lifestyle that you have only dreamed about â€“ now it can be yours.

Plantation oaks

  • 2225 Ashley River Road
  • Charleston, SC 29414
  • Phone:5846.766.6122
  • Email:plantationoaks@high.net

Leasing ofice hours

  • Monday - Friday: 10 a.m. to 5:30 p.m.
  • Saturday: Call for Hours
  • Sunday: Closed

Pet policy

  • $300 for one pet, $500 for 2 pets
  • $10/month for one pet, $15/month for 2 pets
  • Breed restrictions apply
  • Service animals to accompany a resident with a verifiable disability for the purpose of aiding that person are not considered "pets"
